security.name: Cloud Security Alliance Cloud Controls Matrix

controls.title: Identity and Access Management
controls.description: Implement strong identity and access management controls for EventBridge resources

implementation.description: Configure IAM policies with least privilege principles, use resource-based policies for event buses, and implement cross-account access controls

controls.title: Encryption Key Management
controls.description: Implement proper encryption key management for EventBridge data protection

implementation.description: Configure customer-managed KMS keys for EventBridge encryption at rest and in transit

controls.title: Audit Logging
controls.description: Enable comprehensive audit logging for all EventBridge operations

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail logging for EventBridge API calls and configure log retention policies

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Implement data classification and lifecycle management for event data

implementation.description: Classify event data based on sensitivity and implement appropriate retention policies

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to EventBridge resources

implementation.description: Implement resource-based policies and IAM roles with condition-based access controls

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information

implementation.description: Ensure all EventBridge communications use TLS encryption and configure VPC endpoints where required

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Determine which events are to be logged by EventBridge

implementation.description: Configure comprehensive CloudTrail logging and enable EventBridge rule execution logging

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at external boundaries

implementation.description: Implement VPC endpoints for EventBridge and configure security groups for target services

controls.title: System Backup
controls.description: Conduct backups of EventBridge configurations and rules

implementation.description: Implement automated backup of EventBridge rules and configurations using infrastructure as code

controls.title: EventBridge custom event buses should have resource-based policy attached
controls.description: Custom event buses should have resource-based policies to control access

implementation.description: Attach resource-based policies to custom event buses defining allowed principals and actions

controls.title: EventBridge rules should have targets configured
controls.description: EventBridge rules without targets may indicate misconfigurations

implementation.description: Ensure all EventBridge rules have appropriate targets configured and remove unused rules

controls.title: EventBridge custom event buses should be encrypted
controls.description: Custom event buses should use encryption at rest

implementation.description: Configure KMS encryption for custom event buses using customer-managed keys

controls.title: EventBridge should not allow public access
controls.description: EventBridge resources should not be publicly accessible

implementation.description: Review and restrict resource-based policies to prevent public access

controls.title: EventBridge custom event buses should have a resource-based policy attached
controls.description: This control checks whether EventBridge custom event buses have resource-based policies attached

implementation.description: Create and attach resource-based policies to custom event buses with appropriate access controls

controls.title: EventBridge rules should have targets
controls.description: This control checks whether EventBridge rules have targets configured

implementation.description: Configure appropriate targets for all EventBridge rules and remove orphaned rules

controls.title: EventBridge custom event buses should be encrypted
controls.description: This control checks whether EventBridge custom event buses are encrypted

implementation.description: Enable encryption for custom event buses using AWS KMS customer-managed keys

controls.title: EventBridge global endpoints should be encrypted
controls.description: This control checks whether EventBridge global endpoints use encryption

implementation.description: Ensure EventBridge global endpoints are configured with encryption enabled

cost.name: AWS EventBridge Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Optimize Event Pattern Matching
controls.description: Use specific event patterns to reduce unnecessary rule evaluations and processing costs

implementation.description: Design event patterns with specific filters to minimize rule evaluations and avoid broad pattern matching

controls.title: Implement Event Deduplication
controls.description: Prevent duplicate events to reduce processing costs and downstream resource consumption

implementation.description: Implement event deduplication logic and use idempotency tokens where applicable

controls.title: Monitor and Remove Unused Rules
controls.description: Regularly audit and remove unused EventBridge rules to reduce costs

implementation.description: Implement automated monitoring to identify and remove unused rules and event buses

controls.title: Optimize Cross-Region Replication
controls.description: Minimize unnecessary cross-region event replication to reduce data transfer costs

implementation.description: Configure replication rules to replicate only necessary events across regions

controls.title: Use Event Batching
controls.description: Implement event batching for high-volume scenarios to reduce per-event costs

implementation.description: Configure target services to process events in batches where supported

controls.title: Implement Event Filtering at Source
controls.description: Filter events at the source to reduce the number of events sent to EventBridge

implementation.description: Configure event sources to filter events before sending to EventBridge

controls.title: Monitor Event Processing Costs
controls.description: Implement cost monitoring and alerting for EventBridge usage

implementation.description: Set up CloudWatch billing alarms and cost budgets for EventBridge service usage
